text: Customer support is awesome
the product is horrible
The project management was flawless.
Our dedicated manager, Alex, was always on top of things
and communication was crystal clear.
A bit pricey,
but worth every penny for the peace of mind.
We are extremely disappointed with the technical skills of the junior developers assigned to us.
The code was buggy and required constant oversight from our in-house team.
Their support team is incredibly responsive.
We had a critical issue over the weekend and they had it resolved within two hours.
Truly impressive.
The final product was delivered on time
and met all our specifications
Solid work from a reliable team
Billing is a complete mess.
We were overcharged for hours that were not worked
and getting it corrected has been a nightmare.
The developers are technically brilliant
but their project manager seems completely overwhelmed
Deadlines were missed repeatedly due to poor planning
Good value for the price.
The quality isn't top-tier,
but for our budget, it's more than acceptable.
You get what you pay for.
They promised expertise in cloud migration
but their team was clearly learning on the job
The project was delayed by two months
and went over budget
The platform they provided for tracking progress is intuitive
and a huge help
It makes collaboration seamless
I'm giving three stars
the developers are skilled
the communication from the management team is severely lacking
We often felt in the dark about progress
A fantastic partner for our startup.
They understood our vision
and delivered a high-quality MVP
well within our tight deadline.
The time zone difference was a much bigger issue than we anticipated.
Getting timely responses to urgent questions was a constant struggle.
Their QA process needs a serious overhaul.
We found so many obvious bugs in the final delivery
it felt like it wasn't tested at all.
The initial consultation was amazing.
They really took the time to understand our business needs before proposing a solution.
While the project was successful
the constant upselling was exhausting
Every call felt like a new sales pitch for another service
Technically, the work is fine.
But their team shows zero proactivity.
They only do exactly what is asked and never suggest improvements.
We've been working with them for over two years now
and they've become an indispensable part of our team
Highly recommend
The lead developer we worked with, Maria, was a rockstar.
Her expertise in AI was a game-changer for our project.
The team is not very good at taking feedback.
They are a great partner for companies that need to build a high-quality product from scratch.
The project was a complete disaster.
I would not recommend them to my worst enemy.
Their ability to provide a dedicated team
that feels like an extension of our own
is a huge advantage.
The team is not very good at communicating their progress.
They are a great partner for companies that need to modernize their legacy systems.
The project was a complete failure.
I would not recommend them to anyone.
Their ability to provide a cost-effective solution
without sacrificing quality
is a huge plus
The team is not very good at meeting deadlines.
They are a great partner for companies that need to build a complex, enterprise-grade application.
The project was a complete and utter nightmare.
I would not wish this experience on anyone.
Their ability to provide a flexible and scalable team
that can grow with our needs
is a huge plus.
The team is not very good at providing clear and concise documentation.
They are a great partner
for companies that need to build a beautiful and intuitive user interface.
The project was a complete and utter failure.
I would not recommend them to anyone.
